author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police arrested around 100 persons including 30 women for staging road roko on the four-lane national highway on Thursday.

As the ‘End-to-End’ buses operated by Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation between Tirunelveli and Nagercoil do not touch Nanguneri, Valliyoor and Panagudi stops and take the four-lane national highway to reach the destination, petitions were forwarded to the TNSTC officials.

When the problem continued, the public had announced that they would stage a road roko in front of Nanguneri taluk office on the national highway. As the agitation was organised on Thursday, the police detained around 100 persons, and released them in the evening.
title: Police detain 100 protesters for staging road roko
